title: Very High Ping
body: Hello, ive been playing league for 2 years now, and last year at the beginning of the year i had high ping. it stayed like that for a few months before my family swapped to a different internet plan and my ping went from 100+ to 55-79. Since then ive played league a bunch, though im still not very good, i enjoy. But for the past couple of months my ping is alternating from 100- 1000 and i can barely play. has something changed during the last few updates to cause this and is anyone else having a similar problem?

replies.body:
If the high ping has been consistent, it's possible the your ISP's routing has changed and taking longer to reach our server.  It could also be a locally unstable connection, like using a wireless connection or something else.  As a first step, I recommend using our [Connection Troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve any connection issues.

If the guide doesn't resolve this, run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)to determine the route of your con[](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)nection, and attach it in a player support ticket so our tech team can help you out further.  Hopefully we can help get you back in the game as soon as possible!
